entry.title: Awesome Inertiajs Updates on Sep 07 - Sep 13, 2020
entry.content:
Useful Links

  • Documentation - Official website and documentation.
  • Twitter - Official Twitter account.
  • Discord - Official Discord server.
  • Organization - Official GitHub organization.

Resources / Presets

  • Laravel Moonlight (‚≠ê144) - Laravel front-end preset with Tailwind CSS, Inertia.js and Vue.js.
  • Titanium (‚≠ê11) - Laravel front-end preset with Tailwind CSS, Inertia.js and Vue.js.

Resources / Packages

  • Kakunin (‚≠ê39) - Laravel package for real-time form validation.

Resources / Articles

  • Introducing Inertia.js
  • Server-side applications with client-side rendering
  • Inertia.js and Livewire: a high-level comparison
  • Handling authorization in a Laravel and Inertia.js application
  • Handling routes in a Laravel and Inertia.js application

Resources / Examples

  • Ping CRM / Rails (‚≠ê349) - Demonstration application made with Ruby on Rails and Vue.js.
entry.summary: 13 awesome projects updated on Sep 07 - Sep 13, 2020
